services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.description: I provide responsive web design services that ensure your website looks great on all devices. With a focus on user experience, I create visually appealing layouts that adapt seamlessly to any screen size.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: I offer frontend development services using the latest technologies like React, Tailwind CSS, and more. Let me build fast, interactive web applications that deliver a smooth user experience and meet your business needs.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: I provide frontend performance optimization services to enhance your website's speed and efficiency. By implementing best practices and optimizing assets, I ensure your site loads quickly and keeps users engaged.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Our team specializes in UI/UX design to create intuitive and engaging interfaces for your applications. We focus on enhancing user satisfaction through thoughtful design that prioritizes usability and aesthetics.

testimonial.name: Upwork Client
testimonial.message: Akash done fabulous job beyond my expectations. Highly recommend for any react with tailwindcss work. Thank you akash for your hard work.

testimonial.name: Aashish
testimonial.message: Amazing work done and communication is awesome, We will Hire again.

testimonial.name: Chirag Vyas
testimonial.message: Akash's web design skill is excellent. He is also involved in developing our company's websites.

testimonial.name: Vishal Sherathiya
testimonial.message: I worked with Akash for around 4 years. His development and team management skills are unmeasurable. He provided daily updates on top of good communication.

portfolio.heading: Acadly
portfolio.projectDetails:
Acadly helps professors engage students during lectures, and capture attendance at the tap of a button.

 A key highlight of Acadly is its unique mesh-network based automatic attendance technology. It discovers students in your proximity instantly using nothing but the mobile devices used by professors and students, and has been used in classrooms with over 400 students.
portfolio.myRole: Convert detailed product requirements into efficient software solutions, ensuring a streamlined and intuitive user experience that enhances simplicity and usability.

portfolio.heading: Private Company
portfolio.projectDetails: It's private service base company website.
portfolio.myRole: When I was part of this company, I designed and developed this site. I combined multiple theme ideas into a single site since we didn't have a dedicated UX design.

portfolio.heading: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.myRole: I successfully converted the UX design into a fully responsive and modern HTML5 layout, ensuring compatibility across all devices and browsers. By adhering to web standards and best practices, I maintained the visual integrity of the design while optimizing performance for a seamless user experience across different platforms.
